text: Bernard Darniche (born 28 March 1942) is a French former rally driver. He won the European Rally Championship in 1976 and 1977 and the French Rally Championship in 1976 and 1978. He also holds the record for most victories in the Tour de Corse which he won six times (1970, 1975, 1977, 1978, 1979 and 1981).Profile of Darniche and list of results, Rallybase.nl ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:French racecar drivers Category:People from Gironde Category:Sportspeople from Nouvelle-Aquitaine
title: Bernard Darniche
